    Book Reviews

    Here are notes I've taken on books I've read. Some are in-depth, some are short, some include quotes. I've included ratings and genres for future sorting.

    Deep Work - Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World

    Author: Cal Newport

    Rating: ★★★★★

    Genre: Self-Improvement

    Themes: Time management, Work, Focus

    Finished: November 28, 2016

    Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task. It produces great results.
